General.Name: Avrot Industries Ltd
General.Description: Avrot Industries Ltd engages in the lining and coating of steel pipes in Israel. The company offers protected steel pipes, such as APC pipes, internal linings and external coatings by cement mortar, APC GAL galvanized pipes, APC P/E"external fusion-bonded powder coatings, heat shrinkable tapes and sheets, APC fittings, elbows, branches, reduced branches, reducers, and caps; sewage and drainage pipes; and solutions to protect against corrosion. It also manufactures and sells plastics for industrial and chemical industries. The company's products have applications in the transportation of water, sewage, seawater, gas, and petrol in the industrial, municipal, and agricultural sectors. Avrot Industries Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Be'erot Yitzhak, Israel.
General.Address: Kibbutz Beerot - Yitzhak, Be'erot Yitzhak, Israel, 6090500
